title: How to Get Gold Cards in Monopoly Go: Best Strategies

steps.title: Complete Quick Wins.
steps.content: Complete Quick Wins. Quick Wins are usually tasks you can complete during matches, such as landing on a certain tile, rolling the dice, and other specific actions. To access the Quick Wins menu, tap the Wins icon at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Participate in events.
steps.content: Participate in events. Check for live events and participate in them for extra chances to receive gold stickers. These events will have milestones similar to Quick Wins, but the rewards will be much more rare. You can check for live events on the official website for MONOPOLY GO!

steps.title: Participate in the Golden Blitz event.
steps.content: Participate in the Golden Blitz event. This is the only event in which players can trade gold cards with others. During this event, players can trade five times per day for two specific stickers. The Golden Blitz event is a great way to fill in the gaps of your sticker album while helping a friend .
